name: Summon Sorceress
effectText:
2+ monsters with the same Type, except Tokens
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in Defense Position to your opponent's zone this card points to (but negate its effects), then you can Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck in Defense Position with the same Type as that monster (but negate its effects). If you Summon from your Deck this way, you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except monsters with that same original Type. You can only use this effect of "Summon Sorceress" once per turn.
